::KitKat::

She needed someone to talk to, and Drillbit was the one she trusted 
most right now.  "Have a seat.  I just need to talk to you about 
what's going on." She motioned for him to take a seat in a chair next 
to her's.  She got up, closed the door to her room, sono one else 
would hear her, and say back down.  ""Well, here's the update. I 
talked to Aracnia, and instead of her giving her group up and giving 
me command.  We will create the new Predacon Counsil.  And now I have 
found out that the Ark, the maximal ship, has now been destroyed.  So 
our future is now up in the air.  I will send Destructor and a few 
others to help with the reconstruction of the base. Normally I 
wouldn't help the maximals, but if I didn't, then I don't know how 
much longer you," she smiled at him," or the others would survive.  
But at the same time, we won't just give our help either.  Once the 
ark is rebuilt, then  as payback, I shall have the maximals aid us in 
hunting down Megatron and destroying him."  she took a deep sigh."and 
I'm keeping you here. I...I can't let you go.  I know it's not what a 
predacon leader would do if she was thinking correctly, but, I can't 
risk all my best soulders.  And I...I can't risk you."  she looked 
down and sighed. She was having trouble now.  She knew that having 
Drillbit so close to her like this clouded her judgement of command.  
She would have to have him under another, just for command purposes. 
But then again, she wanted to be close to him. 



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::DrillBit::
> 
> He heard her response, and walked to her room. He opened the door 
and
> stood there.
> "Hello, buetiful." He walked up to her, and gave her a light kiss.
> "Looks like commands getting to you. You should rest."
